General.Name: Eastland Equity Bhd
General.Description: Meta Bright Group Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the hospitality, and property development and investment businesses primarily in Malaysia. It operates through Investment Holding, Leasing and Financing, Hospitality, Investment Properties, and Property Development divisions. The company is involved in the operation of shopping complex, office, amusement area, and supermarkets. It also engages in money lending activities. The company was formerly known as EastLand Equity Bhd. and changed its name to Meta Bright Group Berhad in July 2022. Meta Bright Group Berhad is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
